com.alexkasko.tasks
Interface TaskStageProcessor

All Known Subinterfaces:
TaskStageListenableProcessor
public interface TaskStageProcessor

Interface for separate units of business oriented work on task

Author:
alexkasko Date: 5/17/12
See Also:
TaskEngine, TaskEngine.checkSuspended(long), Task, TaskProcessorProvider

Method Summary
 void process(long taskId)
          Some business oriented work to do on task.
 

Method Detail

process

void process(long taskId)
             throws Exception
Some business oriented work to do on task. TaskEngine.checkSuspended(long) method should be called periodically, TaskSuspendedException must be thrown on successful suspension check

Parameters:
taskId - task id
Throws:
TaskSuspendedException - task will rolled back to last completed stage and switched into 'suspended' status
Exception - task will rolled back to last completed stage and switched into 'error' status
